erDiagram
  PERSON ||--o{ ADDRESS : lives_at
  PERSON {
    string name PK
  }
  ADDRESS {
    string street
    string city
  }
---
+----------------+   lives_at   +------------------+
| PERSON         |||----------o{| ADDRESS          |
+----------------+              +------------------+
| PK string name |              |    string street |
+----------------+              |    string city   |
                                +------------------+
